_header: Now now Jesu for Thy circumcision
Subjects: prayers, of Christ; Passion; Christ, wounds of
_description: A prayer by the Seven Times Christ shed his Blood — four 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BodDou322.First Lines:
Now now Ihesu for thy CircumcisiounWhen þu was cut so in
                    flessh and skyn…
BodDou322.Last Lines:
…Þat in þat kyngdom þat ys so wydeWe may
                    reioyse euer þy presence

BLHar1706.First Lines: Nowe good ihesu for þi circumcysyonWhan þou was kutte in flessche and skynne…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …þat in þat kyngdome þat ys so wydeWe maye reioyce euer þi presence
BLHar1706.Note: Second occurrence in this MS; Ends “AMEN” below last line (f. 212v).
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_1706.

Longleat30.First Lines:
Now now ihesu for þi circumcisionwhen þou was kut so in
                    flesch and skyn…
Longleat30.Last Lines:
…That in þat kyngdom þat is so wydeWe may reioyce
                    euer thi presence Amen
Longleat30.Note:
Not set out in stanzas; no space left between preceding 2901 and this, only lombard
                    initial and marginal heading to indicate new text.

HunHM142.First Lines:
Now now Ihesu for thi CircumcisiounWhen þou was kut so in
                    fleshe & skyn…
HunHM142.Last Lines:
… That in þat kyngdom þat is so wydeWe may reioyce
                    euer thi presence
HunHM142.Note:
Not set out in stanzas; no space left between preceding 2901 and this, only illuminated
                    initial and marginal heading to indicate new text.

Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
